columns.name: index
columns.meaning: Unique identifier for each row in the dataset.

columns.name: tuple_id
columns.meaning: A unique identifier for each row in the dataset.

columns.name: src
columns.meaning: The source or origin of the data entry, such as a website, organization, or tracking system.

columns.name: flight
columns.meaning: The flight identifier, which includes the airline code, flight number, and origin-destination pair.

columns.name: sched_dep_time
columns.meaning: The scheduled departure time of the flight, formatted as 'HH:MM a.m./p.m.'.

columns.name: act_dep_time
columns.meaning: The actual departure time of the flight, formatted as 'HH:MM a.m./p.m.'.

columns.name: sched_arr_time
columns.meaning: The scheduled arrival time of the flight, formatted as 'HH:MM a.m./p.m.'.

columns.name: act_arr_time
columns.meaning: The actual arrival time of the flight, formatted as 'HH:MM a.m./p.m.'.
